<list>
  <SQL__WORKSHEET>
    <isActive>true</isActive>
    <isDirty>true</isDirty>
    <index>3</index>
    <content>CREATE TABLE BOARD(
 NO  NUMBER(10)  PRIMARY KEY,
 CATEGORY VARCHAR2(10),
 TITLE  VARCHAR2(255),
 USERNAME VARCHAR2(20),
 USERIP  VARCHAR2(15),
 PASSWORD VARCHAR2(20),
 CONTENT VARCHAR2(4000),
 FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(100),
 HIT  NUMBER(10),
 FILE_SIZE  NUMBER,
 TIME  DATE
) ;</content>
    <name>Worksheet 2</name>
  </SQL__WORKSHEET>
</list>

<list>
  <SQL__WORKSHEET>
    <isActive>false</isActive>
    <isDirty>true</isDirty>
    <index>0</index>
    <content>create table s_emp(
	e_name VARCHAR2(10),
	e_age number(2),
	e_level NUMBER(2),
	dept_id NUMBER(2) PRIMARY KEY 
);

INSERT INTO S_EMP VALUES ('김',25,4,20);
INSERT INTO S_EMP VALUES ('홍',80,6,40);
INSERT INTO S_EMP VALUES ('박',40,7,30);


create table s_dept(
	dept_id NUMBER(2) PRIMARY KEY,
	d_name VARCHAR2(10),
	e_num number(2)
);

INSERT INTO S_DEPT VALUES (20,'기획',4);
INSERT INTO S_DEPT VALUES (30,'경영',12);
INSERT INTO S_DEPT VALUES (40,'기업',1);

 select e.E_NAME, e.E_AGE, e.DEPT_ID, d.D_NAME, d.E_NUM
from s_emp e, s_dept d
where e.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY e.E_AGE;

create table requestname(
	rn_no NUMBER(5) ,
	rn_name VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK_rnno PRIMARY KEY(rn_no)
);

create table product(
	p_no NUMBER(5) ,
	p_name VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK_pno PRIMARY KEY(p_no)
);

CREATE TABLE request(
	r_no NUMBER(5) PRIMARY KEY ,
	r_nno NUMBER(5),
	r_pno NUMBER(5),
	CONSTRAINT fk_rname FOREIGN KEY (r_nno)
	REFERENCES requestname(rn_no) ON DELETE CASCADE,
	CONSTRAINT fk_pno FOREIGN KEY (r_pno)
	REFERENCES product(p_no) ON DELETE CASCADE
);




</content>
    <name>Worksheet 2</name>
  </SQL__WORKSHEET>
</list>

<list>
  <SQL__WORKSHEET>
    <isActive>true</isActive>
    <isDirty>true</isDirty>
    <index>1</index>
    <content>select d.dname 학과명, a.max_height 최대키, s.GRADE 학생학년, s.height 키 from 
(select deptno1, max(height)max_height from student group by deptno1)a, 
student s, department d
where s.deptno1=d.deptno and a.max_height=height;


select s.name, s.GRADE, a.max_height from
(select grade, max(height)max_height from student group by grade)a, 
STUDENT s
where s.grade=a.grade and a.max_height=height;

SELECT s.name "학생이름", p.name "교수이름"
FROM student s JOIN professor p ON( s.profno=p.profno);</content>
    <name>Worksheet 3</name>
  </SQL__WORKSHEET>
  <OBJECT__DETAIL>
    <isActive>false</isActive>
    <isDirty>false</isDirty>
    <index>2</index>
    <name>PROFESSOR</name>
